channel.title: Naturoo Sessions
channel.description: Naturoo Sessions is a monthly DJ set offering hosted by Pekxito & Deeptwelv (Naturoo) also on an occasional basis, inviting guests Djs to deliver their DJ sets. The aim of the show is to promote music from all spheres and sub-genres of house music.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Where Beatz Meet Raw Nature
channel.itunes:author: Naturoo
channel.itunes:summary: Naturoo Sessions is a monthly DJ set offering hosted by Pekxito & Deeptwelv (Naturoo) also on an occasional basis, inviting guests Djs to deliver their DJ sets. The aim of the show is to promote music from all spheres and sub-genres of house music.

item.title: Naturoo Session 06 Mixed by Pekxito "A little bit of Latin & Jazz"
item.description: A little bit of Latin & Jazz, Enjoy this blend. Tracklisting: 1. Light 4 lines pres. YNEZ - Azul(Del Alma Mix) 2. Track ID not available 3. Summer Madness - Sascha Dive 4. Gonna Make It Right - Big Sexy 5. Carlito's Key (Cruznjazz Mix) - Marcelo Cruz & Carlito Brigante 6. A Minor-Simple Pleasures - Alton Miller 7. Power of Beauty (Tribute to Mix) - Orlando Voorn 8. Jazz for May - Dubbyman
item.dc:creator: Naturoo
item.itunes:summary:

Tracklisting:

item.title: Naturoo Session 05 Mixed by Cry 5 (中國皇帝)
item.description: For this DJ Set unfortunately the playlist is not provided, but for specific track ID please holler at pekxito@gmail.com Sello Sebata a.k.a Cry 5: DJ/Legend based in Ga-Rankuwa Zone 4 via Saarkies, Pretoria, South Africa, Africa, Earth. Enjoy this blend!

item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Naturoo Session 04 Mixed by Pekxito (Inspired by DJ Cry 5)
item.description: This mix is inspired by a mentor & friend, Ga-rankuwa's finnest "DJ Cry 5",one of the few lads who are still true to the sound! Hope you gonna enjoy this blend. Tracklisting: 1. 6am - Jake Childs 2. Set it Out - Bittersuite 3. Ever Wonder (Unreleased Mix) - Alton Miller Feat. Abacus 4. Hi-Lee Teched Off (Original Mix) - Kai Alce 5. Playaz Go Deep When They Are Horny - Solid Gold Playaz 6. Downtown (623 Mix) - Kerri Chandler 7. Nothing(Bittersuite Mix) - BRS 8. Time Warp (Main Mix) - Soul Creation And The Masters 9. Alone (Life Underground Mix) - Solid Gold Playaz 10. Jus' House - Move D If you feel this DJ Set please drop a comment "even if you are dissatisfied lol (Hope not!)" Lets do this house thing Yeah!
item.dc:creator: Naturoo
item.itunes:summary:
This mix is inspired by a mentor & friend, Ga-rankuwa's finnest "DJ Cry 5",one of the few lads who are still true to the sound! Hope you gonna enjoy this blend.

Playaz Go Deep When They Are Horny - Solid Gold Playaz 6. Downtown (623 Mix) - Kerri Chandler 7. Nothing(Bittersuite Mix) - BRS 8. Time Warp (Main Mix) - Soul Creation And The Masters 9. Alone (Life Underground Mix) - Solid Gold Playaz 10. Jus' House - Move D
If you feel this DJ Set please drop a comment "even if you are dissatisfied lol (Hope not!)"
Lets do this house thing Yeah!

item.title: Naturoo Session 03 Guestmix by MC Sfoj
item.description: MC Sfoj delivers his Guestmix for Naturoo. Catch up with him on Twitter @MC_Sfoj /Facebook www.facebook.com/mcsfoj Tracklist: 1. Blind Piano Man(Main Mix) - MC Sfoj CDR 2. MC Sfoj Ft SoulKidd- Shattered Thoughts(Guitar Edit) CDR 3. 60 Hertz Project- Let's Take A Ride - Jack2Jazz Records 4. Dolls Combers- Spring Corner(Dolls Combers Main Jazz Mix) 5. B=Note ft Zuziwe- Too Doo(lilac Jeans Main Vocal Mix) 6. Marvin Gaye - Pride & Joy (MC Sfoj's SKR Mix) CDR 7. Avery Sunshine- Ugly Part Of Me 8. Deep'End Soul- Vanessa's Lips(JazzySoul & Monodeluxe Lounge Cafe Mix) 9. Jasper Street Co. ft Louie Vega - Till I Found You(Main Mix) Thanks to MC Sfoj for an awesome blend of beautiful music, watch the space for his work!
item.dc:creator: Naturoo
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Naturoo Session 02 Mixed by Deeptwelv
item.description: Deeptwelv delivers his DJ set, Enjoy! Traclisting: 1. Common - The Light (Deeptwelv's Souled House Mix) 2. Pitto feta. Leonie Muller - Where My Soul Is Now 3. Essential I feat. Jayla - Simple Love (Original Mix) 4. N'dinga Gaba & DJ Spen feat. Marc Evans - Until You (N'dinga's Deep In You Dub) 5. Jullien Gomes feat Bobby - Love Song 28 (Original Mix) 6. Khanyi Balani & Mikki Afflick feat Khuli Dube - Casual People (Casual People Extended Original Mix) 7. DJ Bullet feat D'vine - I Am Not A DJ (Deeptwelv's 2012 Remix) 8. Incognito - Freedom To Love (Atjazz Remix) 9. Liquideep - Feel It (Andre Lodemann Remix)
item.dc:creator: Naturoo
item.itunes:summary:
Deeptwelv delivers his DJ set, Enjoy!
Traclisting:
1. Common - The Light (Deeptwelv's Souled House Mix) 2. Pitto feta. Leonie Muller - Where My Soul Is Now 3. Essential I feat. Jayla - Simple Love (Original Mix) 4. N'dinga Gaba & DJ Spen feat. Marc Evans - Until You (N'dinga's Deep In You Dub) 5. Jullien Gomes feat Bobby - Love Song 28 (Original Mix) 6. Khanyi Balani & Mikki Afflick feat Khuli Dube - Casual People (Casual People Extended Original Mix) 7. DJ Bullet feat D'vine - I Am Not A DJ (Deeptwelv's 2012 Remix) 8. Incognito - Freedom To Love (Atjazz Remix) 9. Liquideep - Feel It (Andre Lodemann Remix)

item.title: Naturoo Session 01 Mixed by Pekxito
item.description: Compiled and mixed by Pekxito for Naturoo. Please support the artists featured on this mixtape @ Traxsource, Beatport & Junodownload. For promotional purposes only, Enjoy! Tracklist: 1 Knockin (Reelsoul Vocal Mix-Byron Stingly presents EL-BananaStreet 2 Ugly Part Of Me (Pirahnahead 39's PRIME Vocal Mix) Avery Sunshine-Ts Box 3 Skyline (Sean McCabe Vocal Mix)-Migosy-Hi:Rise 4 Joy till Midnight Rasoul Remix)-DJ Said feat Reelsoul-Fatsouls 5 The Search (Original Mix)-Ralph Session Feat. Rainy Payne-Seshified Recordings 6 Wish (Frankie Feliciano Ricanstruction Vocal Mix)-Matthew Bandy feat. Josh Milan-Foliage Records 7 One More Time (feat. Evelyn 'Champagne' King) (Sean McCabe Dub)- Divas of Color & Evelyn Champagne King-King Street 8 How Bad I Want Ya (The Remixes) (The Muthafunkaz Mix)-Soul Element feat. Peven Everett-House 4 Life 9 Oh I (Miss You) (Atjazz Love Soul Remix)-The Muthafunkaz-Code Red Recordings Twitter : @Pekxito Facebook : www.facebook.com/Pekxito Deep House Congress Twitter : @dhcongress
